SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(HOPE_DATE,'yyyymmdd'),'yyyy/mm/dd') AS HOPE_DATE, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'yyyy/mm/dd') REG_DT, HOTI_TYP, GROUP_NM, GHLC_TYP, NAME, TEL ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM C_CODE WHERE CODESET='GHLC' AND CODE = V.GHLC_TYP) GHLC_TYP_NM ,(SELECT CODE_NM FROM C_CODE WHERE CODESET='VIST' AND CODE = V.VIST_TYP) VIST_TYP_NM FROM T_VISIT V WHERE 1=1

HOPE_DATE <= #endD#
VIST_TYP = #sel_status#
GHLC_TYP = #sel_loc#
